title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_Koisuru_One_Piece
transformers_text: Koi suru One Piece Japanese Hepburn Koi suru Wan P su lit ' One Piece in Love ' is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Daiki Ihara j a It began serialization on Shueisha's Sh nen Jump manga service in June 2018 It is a spin off of Eiichiro Oda's One Piece manga series An original net animation adaptation was released in April 2025 A group of high school students with the same names as the Straw Hat Pirates end up forming a One Piece fan club Throughout the series parodying moments from the One Piece manga Written and illustrated by Daiki Ihara Koi suru One Piece began serialization on Shueisha's Sh nen Jump manga service on June 18 2018 1 The series went on hiatus on November 7 2021 due to Ihara launching Protect Me S hugo maru in Weekly Sh nen Jump later in the year 4 It resumed serialization on April 10 2025 5 Its chapters have been compiled into eleven tank bon volumes as of November 2025 6 An original net animation adaptation was announced during an Anime Japan event on March 22 2025 The series consisted of five anime shorts that aired on YouTube Insta gram and Tik Tok from April 1 to 5 2025 2
